headline.seo: Is the Stimulus Plan Broad Enough?
headline.main: Time to Steer 'Forceful Course' for Stimulus
headline.print_headline: Time to Steer ‘Forceful Course’ For Stimulus Bill

docs.lead_paragraph: The administration has not answered criticisms that its stimulus package is not as effective as it could be.
docs.snippet: The administration has not answered criticisms that its stimulus package is not as effective as it could be....

headline.main: Obama Commutes Prison Sentences for 330 Before Leaving Office
headline.print_headline: Obama Commutes Prison Sentences for 330 Before Leaving Office

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama commuted the prison sentences of 330 federal inmates, particularly drug offenders, on Thursday, making his quest to reduce what he viewed as overly harsh punishments one of his final acts in office.
docs.snippet: President Barack Obama commuted the prison sentences of 330 federal inmates, particularly drug offenders, on Thursday, making his quest to reduce what he viewed as overly harsh punishments one of his final acts in office....

headline.main: Republicans Target Obama Rules on Methane, Coal
headline.print_headline: Republicans Target Obama Rules on Methane, Coal

docs.lead_paragraph: House Republicans on Wednesday kicked off their efforts to block or undo scores of regulations and executive orders issued by President Barack Obama.
docs.snippet: House Republicans on Wednesday kicked off their efforts to block or undo scores of regulations and executive orders issued by President Barack Obama....

headline.main: Up to 117 Civilians Died in Strikes During Obama Presidency
headline.print_headline: Up to 117 Civilians Died in Strikes During Obama Presidency

docs.lead_paragraph: As many as 117 civilians have been killed in drone and other counterterror attacks in Pakistan, Yemen and elsewhere during President Barack Obama's presidency, according to a report released late Thursday by U.S. intelligence officials.
docs.snippet: As many as 117 civilians have been killed in drone and other counterterror attacks in Pakistan, Yemen and elsewhere during President Barack Obama's presidency, according to a report released late Thursday by U.S. intelligence officials....

headline.main: Trump Asks Some 50 Senior Obama Appointees to Stay On
headline.print_headline: Trump Asks Some 50 Senior Obama Appointees to Stay On

docs.lead_paragraph: President-elect Donald Trump has asked roughly 50 senior Obama administration appointees to remain in their posts after his inauguration to ensure continuity in government, his incoming White House press secretary said Thursday.
docs.snippet: President-elect Donald Trump has asked roughly 50 senior Obama administration appointees to remain in their posts after his inauguration to ensure continuity in government, his incoming White House press secretary said Thursday....

headline.main: Trump Draws Far Smaller Inaugural Crowd Than Obama
headline.print_headline: Trump Draws Far Smaller Inaugural Crowd Than Obama

docs.lead_paragraph: Far fewer people attended President Donald Trump's inauguration Friday than his predecessor's swearing-in eight years ago.
docs.snippet: Far fewer people attended President Donald Trump's inauguration Friday than his predecessor's swearing-in eight years ago....

headline.main: Black Americans Weep for the Obama Era and Uncertain Future
headline.print_headline: Black Americans Weep for the Obama Era and Uncertain Future

docs.lead_paragraph: On the night in 2008 when Barack Obama was elected the country's first black president, many black Americans wept. Eight years later, they weep again for the end of an era some thought they would never live to see — and for the uncertain future they face without him.
docs.snippet: On the night in 2008 when Barack Obama was elected the country's first black president, many black Americans wept. Eight years later, they weep again for the end of an era some thought they would never live to see — and for the uncertain fut...

headline.main: Obama Administration Aids Giant California Water Project
headline.print_headline: Obama Administration Aids Giant California Water Project

docs.lead_paragraph: The outgoing Obama administration on Wednesday tried to nudge forward Gov. Jerry Brown's proposal to build two giant north-south water tunnels for California.
docs.snippet: The outgoing Obama administration on Wednesday tried to nudge forward Gov. Jerry Brown's proposal to build two giant north-south water tunnels for California....

headline.main: Obama Exits the Presidency Voicing Optimism for the Future
headline.print_headline: Obama Exits the Presidency Voicing Optimism for the Future

docs.lead_paragraph: Closing out a barrier-breaking chapter in history, former President Barack Obama left the White House on Friday much the way he entered it eight years ago: insisting Americans have reason for optimism despite the national sense of unease.
docs.snippet: Closing out a barrier-breaking chapter in history, former President Barack Obama left the White House on Friday much the way he entered it eight years ago: insisting Americans have reason for optimism despite the national sense of unease....

headline.main: Obama Denies Pardon Request for Former Alabama Governor
headline.print_headline: Obama Denies Pardon Request for Former Alabama Governor

docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama has denied a clemency petition from former Alabama Gov. Don Siegelman, who is nearing the end of a prison sentence for bribery and obstruction of justice.
docs.snippet: President Barack Obama has denied a clemency petition from former Alabama Gov. Don Siegelman, who is nearing the end of a prison sentence for bribery and obstruction of justice....
